verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> our <S%G80>brother,<s%>

To the <S%G40>saints<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> which are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2857>Colosse:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
We give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> for you,

Since we <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and of the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> you have to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%>

For the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G606>laid<s%> up for you in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> you <S%G4257>heard<s%> <S%G4257>before<s%> in the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G226>truth<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

<S%G3588>Which<s%> is <S%G3918>come<s%> to you, as it is in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world;<s%> and <S%G2592>brings<s%> <S%G1901>forth<s%> <S%G2592>fruit,<s%> as it does <S%G2532>also<s%> in you, <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> you <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, and <S%G1921>knew<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G226>truth:<s%>

As you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3129>learned<s%> of <S%G1889>Epaphras<s%> our <S%G27>dear<s%> fellow <S%G4889>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is for you a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>
<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1213>declared<s%> to us <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> we <S%G191>heard<s%> it, do not <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> for you, and to <S%G154>desire<s%> that you might be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of his <S%G2307>will<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> and <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G4907>understanding;<s%>

That you might <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthy<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G699>pleasing,<s%> being <S%G2592>fruitful<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> and <S%G837>increasing<s%> in the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G1412>Strengthened<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1411>might,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2904>power,<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> and <S%G3115>long-suffering<s%> with <S%G5479>joyfulness;<s%>

Giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> has <S%G2427>made<s%> us <S%G2427>meet<s%> to be <S%G3310>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2819>inheritance<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G5457>light:<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> has <S%G4506>delivered<s%> us from the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> and has <S%G3179>translated<s%> us <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of his <S%G26>dear<s%> <S%G5207>Son:<s%>
In <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G629>redemption<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> his <S%G129>blood,<s%> even the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins:<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> is the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G517>invisible<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2937>creature:<s%>

For by him were <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G2936>created,<s%> that are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and that are in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3707>visible<s%> and <S%G517>invisible,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> they be <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2963>dominions,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G746>principalities,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1849>powers:<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things were <S%G2936>created<s%> by him, and for him:
And he is <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and by him <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G4921>consist.<s%>

And he is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> the <S%G1577>church:<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> that in <S%G3956>all<s%> things he might have the <S%G4409>preeminence.<s%>
For it <S%G2106>pleased<s%> the Father that in him should <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4138>fullness<s%> <S%G2730>dwell;<s%>

And, having <S%G1517>made<s%> <S%G1517>peace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of his <S%G4716>cross,<s%> by him to <S%G604>reconcile<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G848>himself;<s%> by him, I say, <S%G1535>whether<s%> they be things in <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> things in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And you, that were <S%G4218>sometime<s%> <S%G526>alienated<s%> and <S%G2190>enemies<s%> in <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G1271>mind<s%> by <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> has he <S%G604>reconciled<s%>

In the <S%G4983>body<s%> of his <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> you <S%G40>holy<s%> and <S%G299>blameless<s%> and <S%G410>unreproveable<s%> in his <S%G2714>sight:<s%>

<S%G1489>If<s%> you <S%G1961>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2311>grounded<s%> and <S%G1476>settled,<s%> and be not <S%G3334>moved<s%> <S%G3334>away<s%> from the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> which you have <S%G191>heard,<s%> and <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G2784>preached<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%> which is <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> I <S%G3972>Paul<s%> am <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister;<s%>

Who <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> in my <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> for you, and <S%G466>fill<s%> up that which is <S%G5303>behind<s%> of the <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in my <S%G4561>flesh<s%> for his <S%G4983>body's<s%> sake, <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G1577>church:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whereof<s%> I am <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to me for you, to <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

Even the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> has been <S%G614>hid<s%> from <S%G165>ages<s%> and from <S%G1074>generations,<s%> but <S%G3570>now<s%> is <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> to his <S%G40>saints:<s%>

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%> in you, the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1391>glory:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> we <S%G2605>preach,<s%> <S%G3560>warning<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> and <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom;<s%> that we may <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

<S%G1519>Whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2872>labor,<s%> <S%G75>striving<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1753>working,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> in me <S%G1722>mightily.<s%> <S%G1411><s%>
